reviewText: I enjoyed Frank's story and the telling of his transformation. It does feel like a lot is left out between his final outcome and the end of the documentary. Still, it is an inspiring watch.
Title: May I Be Frank DVD

reviewText: This is a beautiful and very funny story of how one man's quest to change his life comes into being. At first, there's no way you can see this guy changing, but with the loving support of the folks at the Café Gratitude, he gradually begins to turn the ship. He learns to love and accept himself, but it is not without many bumps and bruises along the way. The journey is what you get to see here and it is well worth the trip.
Title: May I Be Frank DVD

reviewText: Great heartfelt movie. Wonderful to witness frank becoming frank. What else can I say? I have to meet this *twenty*
Title: May I Be Frank DVD

reviewText: Frank was a man trapped by pharmaceutical medications and a very unhealthy lifestyle, who isshown a better way!! He is guided by three mentors and submits to changing his ways and guesswhat? He changes his life from the inside out!! Way to go FRANK!! I applaude your efforts and prayyou reach many others with your message of hope and healing!!
Title: May I Be Frank DVD

reviewText: Very much worth the time to watch !  Was "real"  on a pure human level . . . . .
summary: Very much worth the time to watch! Was "real" ...
Title: May I Be Frank DVD

reviewText: I loved this documentary, i actually watched it twice and would watch it again.It will make laugh and cry!
Title: May I Be Frank DVD

reviewText: A true story ... a documentary of Frank for 42 days of accepting a life changing challenge!  Exceptional, candid and an absolute real time life drama! Have watched it twice now!
Title: May I Be Frank DVD

reviewText: I enjoyed seeing Frank on his weight loss journey however, I feel the personal drama in many ways deterred from the pure angle of someone going on a weight loss all natural vegan food journey for 42 days. I would like to have seen more about the problems with the food and weight loss and less of the drama between Frank, his x-wife, his daughter and family. I think a follow up is needed since Frank fell off the wagon and gained the weight back and then lost it again via a different method.
summary: May I have less family drama please
Title: May I Be Frank DVD
